body:
So recently I thought about getting some keybinds on my keyboard, for example "/join" and "./report (player) (reason) for hackusators.

Is this allowed?

If it is how do I make some? Thanks!

-Sevo

title: Help with keybinds

replies.body: I'm most likely sure this is allowed, but don't take my word for it. I don't know how to do this, and if I did know, I would want to use this. I remember Itzdylan115 did this, which makes me confident that it's allowed since I know how righteous he is.
